events.message: I received the wrong item and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because the product is not what I ordered.
The customer's message contains refund request keywords; case categorized under Refund cluster.
The ticket has been assigned to customer support agent Sarah for further handling of the refund request.
Hello! I'm Sarah from customer support. I'm here to help you with your refund request for the incorrect order you received.
Could you please provide your order number and some photos of the item you received so I can process your refund more quickly?
Sure, my order number is #45321. I have attached pictures of the item here showing that it does not match what I ordered.
Thank you for the info. I have initiated your refund request. The amount should be returned to your original payment method within 5 to 7 business days.
Thanks for the prompt response. I appreciate the quick resolution and look forward to receiving my refund soon.
Your refund has been processed successfully. Please check your bank statement in a few days and contact us if you need further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and whether there is anything else we can help you with today.
Since there have been no further replies, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us, and have a great day!
